name: Of Old Age
description:
What would you do if you had more time?

Story:

A lone adventurer is seeking a legendary mystical object that is said to manipulate time itself. The adventurer has traveled deep into the Timeworn Forest where the mystical object was rumored to be hidden. After months of searching, the adventurer discovers a grove where time itself appears to stay still. Upon stepping through the thicket of trees the adventurer hears a low hum. As the adventurer nears the artifact the humming grows louder, the world shimmers around them, and time begins to change.

Controls: 

A/D

Movement

Spacebar

Jump

J

Make Younger

K

Make Older

R

Restart
